metadata.title: CVE-2019-12984 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability in the functionnfc_genl_deactivate_target() in net/nfc/netlink.c in the Linux kernelbefore 5.1.13 can be triggered by a malicious user-mode program that omitscertain NFC attributes, leading to denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
